data.title: Hampton Inn employee Kayla Adler
data.text: I called Hampton Inn this morning & Kayla answered the phone - best service ever - her suggestions were very helpful & I look forward to staying in downtown Knoxville.  She deserves to be recognized for the effort she puts forth to make the customer feel so welcome - thank you Kayla Adler!

data.title: Great front desk staff
data.text: Great front desk staff. They were very helpful with everything from directions to recommendations. Room was ok could have used some better toiletries. Beds were comfortable and rooms were quiet. Would stay here again.

data.title: Good Value
data.text: Hampton Inns regular provide a quality experience at a good price.  This hotel is in a convenient location to the downtown Market Square area and the campus of the University of Tennessee.  All are in walking distance from the hotel.

data.title: Football weekend
data.text:
Great family hotel. Great breakfast and front desk crew. Robert, Kayla Adler and Shakayla Cobb were of assistance at all times. Shakayla also helped provide me with activities for our 6 year old. 
Kayla was a real help in getting us into a great room where the kids could overlook the Worlds Fair Park.

data.title: Clean room, great breakfast spread
data.text:
Stayed at the hotel for the UT v. Tenn Tech game.  We were greeted very warmly by the staff upon arrival at about 1 p.m.  Young lady gave us the key to the room and we freshened up before walking to the stadium.  The same young lady was there when we returned after 8 p.m. and was still very warm and welcoming.  However, she had a helper who had long straight hair, wish I had gotten her name, who was downright rude.  In the number of times I stayed at the hotel, that is the first time I encountered a staff member who acted like they were simply too bored and disinterested to help a guest. It only takes one to spoil the whole bunch.
As for the room, it was very clean and comfortable.  Unfortunately, we could hear conversations from other rooms through the walls.  More disturbingly, we could hear conversations through the vent in the bathroom very clearly.
Because it was a game day weekend, the buffet breakfast spread was amazing.  Breakfast casseroles, blueberry bars, pigs in a blanket, even a lemon cake.  The staff member who has been putting this on for seven season did a great job.  Really enjoyable.
Nice place to stay in Knoxville!

data.title: We loved the room
data.text: The rooms at Hampton are larger than the average hotel room. They have the feel of relaxation and comfort. We will always stay there on any return trip to Knoxville. The prices are very reasonable. The layout of our floor would permit anyone a short trip from the elevator to any room. This is great for any traveler with heavy luggage.

owner_response.author: Kimberly B, Front Office Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind words and great review! We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The downtown Knoxville Hampton inn
data.text: I highly recommend this hotel . It's very close to all the great downtown restaurants. The staff is very helpful with local recommendations pertaining to dining, entertainment and any other service one might require

owner_response.author: Kimberly B, Front Office Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind words and candid feedback! We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Breakfast sucked
data.text: The hotel is clean but that is a basic requirement. Staff were helpfull and friendly another basic requirement. The stay was spoilt by the sucky breakfast it was aweful. The location was a short walk to market street.

owner_response.author: Kimberly B, Front Office Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your candid feedback. I am sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your Hampton standard breakfast. Each day has a different featured breakfast item. We hope that you will stay with us again in the future so that you can try one of our other options.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One of my favorite Hampton Inns
data.text: The staff here is amazing, HOWEVER, if you get a room facing the "Church" side of the hotel, prepare for a very loud stay.  The traffic noise on that side of the hotel is loud and non-stop.  Other than that, it's a beautiful property.

owner_response.author: Kimberly B, Front Office Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and great review! Please come back and see us the next time you're in Knoxville and we would be happy to provide you with a room on the opposite side of the building.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Friendly staff. Clean rooms.
data.text: I had a Great stay. Nice, Clean rooms. Nice, open, breakfast area. Very accommodating staff. The staff went out of their way to accommodate me when I wasn't feeling well. I was traveling for business and when I'm back in the area I will come back again!

owner_response.author: Kimberly B, Front Office Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the kind words and great review! We hope to see you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Customer service done right!
data.text: I was so pleased with my accommodations and the location of this Hampton Inn. It is walking distance from the Market Square and tons of businesses that serves business travelers well. It's also kid friendly. I would definitely book with this hotel again.

owner_response.author: Kimberly B, Front Office Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the kind words and great review! We hope that if you are in the area again,  you will choose to stay with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Staffed Hotel in Knoxville
data.text: You won't find a better staffed hotel in Knoxville. I wished I owned a business in East TN I would hire all of them. I love them all!They truly treat you like family and help make your trip the best.I have in the past 6 years stayed at other hotels but only because they are totally booked.

owner_response.author: Robert W, Assistant Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write such a glowing review on our staff! We always enjoy having you and your family come visit us. As always, we look forward to your next stay.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fair location/close to downtown
data.text: We arrived at 1pm on Saturday.  They didn't have any rooms available so we walked about 10 minutes to market square for some lunch and shopping.  We got back to the hotel about 230 and we still couldn't get our room so we hung out in the sitting area.  They provided us with some water while we waited.  At 3pm our room was ready.  The room was on the sixth floor and it was nice, but there was some noise from the street and a church bell kept going off.  The parking is good and the location is good.  We wished they offered room service.

owner_response.author: Robert W, Assistant Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.  We apologize that your room was not ready prior to our 3:00 check-in time, and thank you for your understanding in that regard. In regards to room service, we feel that we would not be able to compete with the plethora of available dining and delivery options available in our downtown location. Due to this, we as a select-service hotel decided to focus on where we can impact your stay the most, with outstanding service! Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to your next stay.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Comfortable hotel in a great location
data.text:
Stayed one night at this hotel in downtown Knoxville. Easy walking to downtown offices and the restaurants and shops on Market Street. You can even walk to the university, if you don't mind a little hike. Comfortable rooms. Adequate free breakfast. Friendly staff.

IMPORTANT: This hotel is built right on the street, without an entrance portico or drive. When you arrive, you must drive down into the small attached garage. Just pull forward and the gate will go up. Then you enter the hotel through the doors in the garage. If you don't know about this, it's a bit perplexing.  Also, because the hotel is built on the corner of a busy street, you should try for a room that overlooks the parking garage, away from the traffic noise.

owner_response.author: Robert W, Assistant Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our convenient location, free breakfast, and friendly staff! We look forward to your next stay.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Hotel in Downtown Knoxville, TN
data.text: We stay at Hampton Inns regularly. We attend several events in Knoxville every year. This is one of the best Hampton Inns we have ever stayed at. We are thoroughly pleased with the staff and the facility every time. We will be back.

owner_response.author: Kimberly B, Front Office Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and great review! We take great pride in providing excellent service to our guests! We would love to have you stay with us again if you are ever in the Downtown Knoxville area in the future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great location and vibe!
data.text: This was my first time staying in downtown Knoxville and I will definitely go back. Lovely hotel and great location. Walking distance to plenty of restaurants and just across street from event center. Super clean too which is a must!

owner_response.author: Robert W, Assistant Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback and for taking the time to write about your experience.  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our convenient location and how clean the hotel is. We look forward to your next stay.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Super location
data.text: We had a terrific experience here!  Quiet comfy room; great staff; good breakfast; superior location, within walking distance of virtually everything!  We would definitely stay here again and it has a strong recommendation from my husband and me

owner_response.author: Justin D, Sales Coordinator  at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for such an amazing review! We look forward to servicing you and your family again soon.   warm regards
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Knoxville hotel
data.text: We were treated very well. Our room was ready early & they were very efficient. The only downside was that the pool was too small for my grandchildren to really enjoy swimming. The rooms were wonderful & the beds were so comfortable!

owner_response.author: Kimberly B, Front Office Manager at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind words and great review! I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay! I hope the next time you are in the Knoxville area, you will stay with us again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Most Excellent Downtown Knoxville Hotel
data.text: Spur of the moment trip to Knoxville, and made reservations at the Hampton Inn & Suites Downtown the day before arrival.  The person I booked the reservation with on the phone was excellent (was at another hotel in another city and did not want to enter my cc information on the public network so had to call for the reservation.)  Front desk staff was excellent upon check-in and throughout our 36 hours there. The staff was so welcoming and professional, we felt at home! Room was great, noise level was what you would expect for a downtown city hotel. Breakfast so far exceeded our expectations! Cannot say enough great things about this property!

owner_response.author: Justin D, Sales Coordinator  at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for such a wonderful review! I`m pleased to see you enjoyed our hot deluxe hot breakfast and the other amenities our hotel offers. We pride ourselves on such things and we look forward to servicing you and your family again soon. warm regards
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Could be Excellent ...
data.text: Nice downtown location within walking distance to attractions and restaurants.  Free covered parking was an unexpected pleasure.  Very welcoming front desk staff.  The gap between very good and excellent is the lack of attention to detail in housekeeping and maintenance.  The room was standard Hampton issue; however, the furniture was not arranged, the TV screen looked as if it had been wiped with a greasy rag, and the soap dish in the tub was broken from the wall.  Low numbered rooms are close to a busy street and had traffic noise throughout the stay.

owner_response.author: Justin D, Sales Coordinator  at Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville - Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: thanks for your kinds words and the time you took to share them with us. It is great to hear, that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Rest ensured, that we will take you comments for further encouragement within the team to ensure personal service and warm welcome for your next visit. Be informed, that we will enhance our hotel by the end of the year for even more comfort. All the best and see you soon! Warm regards
owner_response.title: Owner Response
